DESCRIPTION:
Hercules is a game based on the hit Disney film of the same name, you must help Hercules battle and defeat the Cyclops
before he destroys Thebes.
Help Hercules dodge falling columns, terrified Thebans, and runaway chariots.
If you need to high-speed power burst, keep your eyes peeled for Hermes' sandals.
